name: Takahiro Hara
content: Takahiro HARA Home Page Japanese Takahiro HARA Professor Multimedia Data Engineering Lab. Department of Multimedia Engineering Graduate School of Information Science and Technology Osaka University 1-5 Yamadaoka, Suita, Osaka 565-0871, Japan TEL: +81-6-6879-4510 FAX: +81-6-6879-4514 Publications Activity Research Invited Talk Takahiro HARA received the B.E, M.E and Dr.E degrees in Information Systems Engineering from Osaka University, Osaka, Japan, in 1995, 1997, and 2000, respectively. Currently, he is a full Professor of the Department of Multimedia Engineering, Osaka University. His research interests include database systems, mobile computing systems, Web mining, and mobile ad hoc networks. Hot Links Hara Lab. Home Page Graduate School of Information Science and Technology Dept. of Information Systems Engineering Faculty of Engineering Osaka University If you have comments or suggestions, email me at hara @ ist.osaka-u.ac.jp
